        public static Firework LaunchFirework(Location spawnLocation,
                      FireworkEffect.Type type,
                      int power,
                      ArrayList<Color> colors,
                      ArrayList<Color> fadecolors,
                      boolean flicker,
                      boolean trail)
        Launch a firework at a given location with specified properties
        Parameters:
        spawnLocation - the location for the firework
        type - the firework type
        power - the power of the firework
        colors - the colors of the fireworks
        fadecolors - the colors for the firework to fade to
        trail - if the firework should leave a trail
        flicker - if the firework should flicker

      • LaunchFirework

        Launch a firework at a given location with specified properties Will use same fade color as color and have trail and flicker enabled
        Parameters:
        spawnLocation - the location for the firework
        type - the firework type
        power - the power of the firework
        colors - the colors of the fireworks
